channel.title: Cosmas of Maiumas on Eschenbach's De Poetis Christianis Sacris
channel.description: Recent content in Cosmas of Maiumas on Eschenbach's De Poetis Christianis Sacris

item.title: XVI
item.description: Hujus Johannis, in D. Sabae Monasterio, sodalis fuit Cosmas Hierosolymitanus, qui à Graecis Ἁγιοπολίτης cognominatus est. Reliquit praeter Canones Musicos, Hymnos quoque, quorum tredecim Latinè exstant, in Bibl. PP. Tom. 8. edit. 2. f. 697. et Bibl. Magn. Colon. Tom. 7. Plura de eo invenies ap. Gyraldum, Dial. v.
